Welcome to the Acme Site in Nowhere City. Every visitor must be aware of some basic information on the site and of some simple rules for their own safety.
 The site is classified at High risk because of the presence of large quantities of flammable, carcinogen and toxic substances. 
 In the areas marked with a yellow line on the ground the use of Safety shoes and helmet is mandatory. 
 In the areas marked with an orange line on the ground specific hazards related to Explosive Atmospheres and Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) might be present. 
 In case you should notice some unusual event or a dangerous situation, please report it to your supervisor and follow his instructions.
 In case you should not be able to alert your supervisor, dial the internal number 288 to report the emergency situation. 
 In case of an emergency, an alarm will sound. In this case reach the assembly point as soon as possible. The Assembly point is located in the parking area n.2
